mapper.select:
select tp."code" || ':' || tp."action" || ':' || tp."entityId" from ( (SELECT r_role_priv."orgId" "entityId", "define"."code", "define"."action" from "TstOrgPrivilegeDefine" "define" join "TstOrgRolePrivilegeRelation" r_role_priv ON r_role_priv."orgPrivilegeId" = "define".id
where r_role_priv."orgRoleId" = any (select _user_org_role(${userId})) AND NOT "define".deleted and NOT "define".disabled order by "entityId", "code", "action" asc)
UNION
(SELECT tmp."projectId" "entityId", "define"."code", "define"."action" from "TstProjectPrivilegeDefine" "define" left join "TstProjectRolePriviledgeRelation" r on r."projectPrivilegeDefineId" = "define".id INNER join (select "projectId", "projectRoleId" from _user_project_role(${userId})) tmp on r."projectRoleId" = tmp."projectRoleId"
where TRUE order by "entityId", "code", "action")
UNION SELECT r."orgId" "entityId", 'org_access' "code", 'view' "action" from "TstOrgUserRelation" r WHERE r."userId" = ${userId}
UNION
SELECT "entityId", 'project_access' "code", 'view' "action" from ( select relation."projectId" "entityId" from "TstProjectRoleEntityRelation" relation where ( (relation.type = 'user' AND relation."entityId" = ${userId}) or (relation.type = 'group' AND relation."entityId" in ( select grp.id from "TstOrgGroup" grp left join "TstOrgGroupUserRelation" relat on relat."orgGroupId" = grp.id left join "TstUser" userr on relat."userId" = userr.id where userr.id = ${userId} ) ) ) ) r
) tp order by tp."code", tp."action"
